title: Slice Master
long_description: Take to the skies and slice all the things! From coconuts to coffee cups, from bricks to burgers. Max out your score and unlock all nine knives!
short_description: It's choppin' time! Slice everything in your way.

title: Tiny Fishing
long_description: Looks like a nice day to go fishing! Cast your line and reel in a legendary fish. Earn cash to buy new hooks and skills.
short_description: 20 new deep sea fishes have dropped!

title: Suika Watermelon Game
long_description: Mash fruits together and watch them grow from a tiny blueberry to an enormous watermelon!
short_description: Merge fruits all the way to watermelon!

title: Moto X3M
long_description: Hop on your dirt bike and ride over jumps, do tricks, and try not to lose control! Memorize the course and execute your stunts perfectly.
short_description: Can you make it through the course?

title: Run 3
long_description: Complete the Run trilogy! Explore hundreds of new levels in a huge new galaxy. Ready... set... GO!
short_description: Run, skate and jump through a brand new galaxy!

title: Planet Clicker
long_description: Energize the solar system! The goal of Planet Clicker is to generate as much energy as possible and unlock upgrades to increase your production.
short_description: Energize the solar system!

title: Bloxd.io
long_description: What will you build today? Explore a 3D sandbox of boundless creativity. Play solo or with friends for worlds of fun!
short_description: Build, explore, and more in a 3D multiplayer world!

title: Fireboy and Watergirl in the Forest Temple
long_description: Help Fireboy and Watergirl work together to collect all the diamonds and get through each maze to the exit.
short_description: Help them work together!

title: Papa's Freezeria
long_description: Use counting and time management to run a Freezeria. Keep the customers happy to make big tips! Watch out for the food critic!
short_description: Mix up a frozen concoction!

title: Poptropica
long_description: On the all-new Fairy Tale island, everyone's happy endings have gone awry. Can you save the day?
short_description: Hop into your hot air balloon and explore quirky lands!

title: Clicker Heroes
long_description: Click to defeat monsters, earn gold and level up heroes. Ascend and transcend to reach new heights of power. See how far you can go!
short_description: Defeat monsters and level up your heroes.

title: Stack Game
long_description: Timing is of the essence in this stacking game. Build a tower block by block that reaches the highest point possible!
short_description: Stack it up, block by block!

title: Candy Clicker 2
long_description: More candy, more clicks, more upgrades! Build up your candy empire, earn achievements, and become the ultimate sugar mogul.
short_description: More candy, more clicks, more upgrades!

title: Chess
long_description: Checkmate! Play the classic game of strategy. You can challenge the computer, a friend, or join a match against another online player.
short_description: Play Chess against the computer or your friends!

title: Checkers
long_description: Play vs. the computer or join a match against another online player!
short_description: Challenge the computer or try online matchmaking!

title: Hangman
long_description: Hang on to your balloons! Guess the letters to solve the word puzzle and stay alive. Join a quick game to play online, or set up a private game to play with your friends.
short_description: Play the classic game with your friends!

title: Penalty Kick Online
long_description: Level up and earn XP on your way to the world championship. Challenge other players online in this epic penalty shootout!
short_description: Win trophies in online multiplayer!

title: Retro Ping Pong
long_description: Play the classic game, or mix it up with an all-new action mode: fireballs, blasters, gravity wells, and more!
short_description: Play the classic game or the all-new action mode!

title: Open 50 Doors
long_description: Every door opens a new challenge! You need to solve the puzzles and open all 50 doors. Use the clues in your environment to find a way in.
short_description: Every door opens a new challenge!

title: Hexanaut.io
long_description: Grab towers, slice your opponents and conquer the map! Gain speed as you grow bigger and take more territory. Can you become the Hexanaut?
short_description: Rank up and unlock new skins!

title: Boxes Wizard
long_description: Solve puzzles with supreme box-swapping spells and gather the treasure! Avoid dangerous spikes and traps as you take all the gems and glory.
short_description: Solve puzzles with your supreme box-swapping spells!

alt: Moto X3M Pool Party Game Logo
title: Moto X3M Pool Party
long_description: Grab your bike, master the jumps and pull off sweet flips! Race to the finish line and get all 3 stars.
short_description: Grab your bike and hit the pool!

title: Blasting Marbles
long_description: Blast those marbles home! Watch them bounce off the walls and avoid the tricky traps to get them back home safely.
short_description: Blast those marbles home!

title: Papa's Wingeria
long_description: Another great Papa's game! This time, you have to run a Wingeria. Use counting and time management to keep your customers happy and make big tips!
short_description: Another great Papa's game!

title: Fat Slice 2
long_description: Slice and dice these new crazy shapes! Trim down all the shapes without getting hit by the balls.
short_description: Slice and dice these new crazy shapes!

title: Raccoon Retail
long_description: Hop on your zamboni and take out the trash! Tidy up the supermarket to earn cash and upgrade your cleaning machine and spiffy up the store.
short_description: Hop on your zamboni and take out the trash!

title: Tropical Merge
long_description: Restore this island to its former glory! Merge your resources to grow fruit, raise livestock, and discover what happened to your missing grandfather!
short_description: Restore this island to its former glory!

title: Papa's Burgeria
long_description: You have to run the Burgeria! Take orders, make burgers, and keep your customers happy. Juggle between orders and make sure each customer leaves satisfied.
short_description: Flip and serve juicy burgers!

title: Jelly Collapse
long_description: A fantastic game from the maker of the hit Gluey games. Delete blocks of jelly of the same color... The bigger the block of jellies, the more points you'll get!
short_description: Delete jelly blocks of the same color. Sound easy?

title: Cricket Cup Online
long_description: Hit the ball out of the ground! Compete against the computer in single-player mode or test your skills against other players in online multiplayer.
short_description: The World Cup is underway. Choose your favorite country and play!

title: Wood Block Puzzle
long_description: Two classics meet in one strategic, wood-grain package! Place Tetris-shaped blocks on a Sudoku-like grid to set a new high score.
short_description: Sudoku meets Tetris! Place wooden blocks for a high score.

title: Abandoned
long_description: Uncover the secrets of an ancient civilization and its lost technologies in a search for your missing brother.
short_description: An abandoned temple. A lost brother.

title: Cubeform
long_description: Bounce along the twisty tower. Dodge the ledges that are blocking your path for as long as you can!
short_description: Bounce along the twisty tower.

title: Block Toggle
long_description: You can control the platforms! Turn them on and off at the right time to reach the portal safely.
short_description: It's as easy as 1-2-3!

title: Chinese Checkers
long_description: The classic board game. Get your marbles to the other side of the board before your opponent can!
short_description: Get your marbles to the other side.

title: Curve Ball 3D
long_description: Put some spin on your shot! Move quickly to guard your goal and smash the ball down the court. Do you have the skills to be the Curve Ball champion?
short_description: Bounce, curve, and score!

title: Space Is Key Christmas
long_description: Grab a cup of hot chocolate and warm up your fingers, because Space Is Key is here for the holidays! Figure out how to jump over all of the obstacles.
short_description: It's our hardest holiday game.

title: Billiards
long_description: Grab a cue and take your best shot! Can you read the angles and run the table in this classic game of billiards?
short_description: Grab a cue and take your best shot!

title: Push Your Luck
long_description: Step up and spin the wheel in this cool way to learn about probability! Guess higher or lower to win big points. Will you play it safe or risk it all?
short_description: Step up and spin the wheel!
